name: Construct Space Platformer
description:
Space platformer

In this game, you will explore the field to avoid traps, kill monsters, defeat the boss, and go home. Use the arrow keys to move and left click to fire at enemies. Collect white potions to gain health. Don't touch blue potions because they will reduce health. After defeating the boss, move the character to the satellite dish which is spawned after the crab's death and touch the character to it. A plane will go down to the middle of the screen. Go touch the plane to win the game.
